{"rule":"UPPERCASE_SENTENCE_START","sentence":"^\\Qexpands placeholders ending with (s) or something like {1,2,...} like {{file(s)}} to placeholders with asterisk quantifier like {file\\* file}\nconverts special placeholders defined in $HOME/.md-to-clip.yaml\nconverts integer, float, option, device, path, file, directory, boolean character and string placeholders\nexpands placeholders with one_or_more/two_or_more/.../nine_or_more like *{{one_or_more_files}} to placeholders with range quantifier like {/?file 2..\\E$"}
{"rule":"DOUBLE_PUNCTUATION","sentence":"^\\Qexpands placeholders ending with (s) or something like {1,2,...} like {{file(s)}} to placeholders with asterisk quantifier like {file\\* file}\nconverts special placeholders defined in $HOME/.md-to-clip.yaml\nconverts integer, float, option, device, path, file, directory, boolean character and string placeholders\nexpands placeholders with one_or_more/two_or_more/.../nine_or_more like *{{one_or_more_files}} to placeholders with range quantifier like {/?file 2..\\E$"}
